contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "thirteenth" is the ordinal form of "13." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
The word "eleventh" is the ordinal form of "11."(See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
Jehoiakim had been king of Judah for more than three years. See how you translated this in [Jeremiah 25:1](../25/01.md). (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: in the fourth year of Jehoiakim ... king of Judah

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "second" is the ordinal form of the number 2. Possible meanings are 1) "the day after" or 2) "two days after" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
The word "fourth" is the ordinal form of the number four. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
The word "fourth" is the ordinal form of "four." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
"after he had been king for three years." This "fourth" is the ordinal number for four. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: in the fourth year of his reign

contextId.occurrenceNote: after Zedekiah had been king for eight years, in the tenth calendar month, on the tenth day of the month (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: in the ninth year of the reign of King Zedekiah, in the tenth month, and on the tenth day of the month

contextId.occurrenceNote: until Zedekiah had been king for more than ten years (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: until the eleventh year of King Zedekiah's reign

contextId.occurrenceNote: after Jehoiachin had been an exile for more than 36 years (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: in the thirty-seventh year of the exile of Jehoiachin
